A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Storylines that are designed to increase run time plague this film\, as countless universe breaking concepts are dropped and then forgotten in what is a mess of exciting visual effects coupled with poor story telling that is utterly forgettable\, but entertaining. Easily the worst addition to the franchise since the Clone Wars\, but still worth $9 if you want to be hip\, or $1.75 if you are to wait for Redbox.
